name: Cat in a Croc
text: You are on a ROLL with these designs!

name: Cat in a Croc
text: I knew you were going to be the perfect cat to complete these tasks.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: *whisper* So between you and me..

name: Cat in a Croc
text: The next cat that you're going to help next is actually Jewel's distant cousin, Bella.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: They used to be best friends when they were younger, but now?

name: Cat in a Croc
text: This is from what I've been seeing on the Twooters..

name: Cat in a Croc
text: They hate eachother now because Bella got involved with another cat..

name: Cat in a Croc
text: A cat who wears SLIDES

name: Cat in a Croc
text: Can you believe it??

name: Cat in a Croc
text: And now Bella just talks about this Cat in a Slide online.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: Can't believe it either.

name: Me
text: *thinking* How does this cat come up with this stuff?

name: Me
text: Yup. Mhmm. Unbelievable. Despicable.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: Right?? Even with this new gossip, you still need to create the greatest website!

name: Cat in a Croc
text: Bella is really quiet and doesn't talk to much.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: *phone alarm goes off*

name: Cat in a Croc
text: Oop- perfect timing.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: It's time for my mid-afternoon croc polish and snack. See ya!

name: Me
text: Alone once again..

name: Me
text: (You feel a tap on your shoulder from behind you as you wait on the bench)

name: Bella
text: Hiiii, I'm Bella! Sorry, I didn't mean to scare you.

name: Bella
text: Thank you for helping me with my journal website.

name: Bella
text: I've been having trouble with all the shortcuts and wanting it to be kept minimal.

name: Bella
text: You are so kind for taking the time to do this for me.

name: Bella
text: I've been hearing rumors about me and no one really talks to me anymore.

name: Me
text: Aw, that's so sad..

name: Bella
text: It's okay, really. I know it's because of this new cat I met awhile ago.

name: Bella
text: There's something different about him.

name: Bella
text: He's incredibly fast. And strong. His fur is pale-white, ice-cold.

name: Bella
text: His eyes change color. And sometimes he speaks like... he's from a different time.

name: Bella
text: He never eats food, or drinks, or come out in the sunlight.

name: Bella
text: I can never get him to go out with me during the day.

name: Bella
text: Oh- sorry! I didn't mean to ramble on like that.

name: Bella
text: I just can't figure him out. It's so mysterious.

name: Bella
text: Anyway, thank you again! I hope you can meet him one day!

name: Me
text: I hope so, too.

name: Me
text: *thinking* What is happening right now? I'm so invested.
